Class InventoryDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.capstone.Database.InventoryDatabase
public class InventoryDatabase extends Object
The InventoryDatabase class handles the database operations related to the inventory system. It includes methods for creating and managing product, part, and user data.

    • productTablePopulate

      public void productTablePopulate()
      Populates the product table by reading all records from the Product_Table in the database. It retrieves product data such as ID, name, price, stock, min, and max values, then creates new Product objects and adds them to the Inventory. The method handles SQL exceptions by throwing a RuntimeException.
